Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Visconti places you in the heart of Melzo and within the vicinity of Parco Dei Germani and Parco Della Preistoria. This hotel is within the vicinity of Molinetto Country Club and Mondadori.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Hotel Visconti places you in the heart of Melzo and within the vicinity of Parco Dei Germani and Parco Della Preistoria. This hotel is within the vicinity of Molinetto Country Club and Mondadori.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Parco Dei Germani - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Parco Della Preistoria - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Molinetto Country Club - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Mondadori - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Parco Dell'idroscalo - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Circolo Arci Magnolia - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Zoate Golf Club - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Exhibition Park Novegro - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
San Raffaele Hospital - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
National Institute of Nuclear Research - 11.7 km / 7.2 mi
Energy Park - 12.3 km / 7.7 mi
Centro Commerciale Torri Bianche - 12.5 km / 7.7 mi
Stadio Brianteo - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Vulcano Shopping Centre - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Hospital of Desio and Vimercate - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Visconti is Milan (LIN-Linate) - 11 km / 6.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
